name: places/ChIJJ2aR--ZYwokREM7lqRyRigY
formattedAddress: 328 E 61st St, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 328 E 61st St, New York, NY 10065, USA

editorialSummary.text: Cozy exercise space featuring small-group HIIT & tone classes, plus semi-private & private training.

originalText.text:
I'm truly impressed with the exceptional attention each client receives at TSFitness. The trainers' extensive knowledge base is evident, making every session personalized and effective, whether you’re talking breathing or technical kettlebell fine tuning. The inspiring and motivating vibe in the studio creates an inclusive environment for clients of all fitness backgrounds. My fav trainers are Kevin Moya & Filip Andreev.

As a fitness professional myself in martial arts and yoga, I needed strength training to help me prepare for some medium & long term goals in competition. Already my body has changed for the better and I’m feeling more confident that my competition goals are coming to fruition.

Noam, the owner and founder, is an admired leader in the fitness community for good reason. He champions each client, encouraging them to fulfill their best potential both physically & mentally. The support and compassion he models makes everyone feel they can be a success in all aspects of their life.

I highly recommend TSFitness to anyone who cares about excellence and wants to level up their fitness journey.

originalText.text: Amazing coaches & facility! I initially signed on to improve my health and I needed accountability, as I am not the best in keeping myself accountable, and they held me to it in an encouraging and positive way. The coaches believed in me and my ability and kept me going, even when I didn't believe in myself. I love coming in and letting out stress from work/life through workouts tailored for me. I definitely feel and look like a new person since starting a year and a half ago. I couldn't recommend them enough!

originalText.text: TS Fitness is the best! I am now on Month 2 of training and they've been unbelievable. The Staff & Coaches are SO supportive and I already see and feel such a change. I have a goal for my upcoming wedding and they are helping me to achieve it and More! It's a great community and happy to be a part of it!

text.text: TS Fitness is the best! I am now on Month 2 of training and they've been unbelievable. The Staff & Coaches are SO supportive and I already see and feel such a change. I have a goal for my upcoming wedding and they are helping me to achieve it and More! It's a great community and happy to be a part of it!

originalText.text: I have been going to TS for a little over a year now, and it has completely changed my life. Prior to TS, I hated working out and had no idea where to begin. The coaches were so helpful in creating my personalized fitness plan -- and they continue to be invested in my journey as my goals change. The community is also so incredibly kind and welcoming. I have found a new passion for fitness and made new friends and rebuilt my confidence while doing so. If you are thinking about joining -- just do it!

text.text: I have been going to TS for a little over a year now, and it has completely changed my life. Prior to TS, I hated working out and had no idea where to begin. The coaches were so helpful in creating my personalized fitness plan -- and they continue to be invested in my journey as my goals change. The community is also so incredibly kind and welcoming. I have found a new passion for fitness and made new friends and rebuilt my confidence while doing so. If you are thinking about joining -- just do it!

originalText.text:
I’ve never been someone who could keep a consistent workout schedule. I didn’t know my way around the gym. I had always just written myself off as someone that wasn’t athletically inclined.

Joining TS has completely turned me around on this. Noam and the team hit that right balance of being encouraging while also pushing you to achieve more. They reach out to get you back in the gym when you fall back on lazy habits. And all of this happens in a fun and supportive group environment. All of the trainers are extremely knowledgeable and work to accommodate existing injuries. This is coupled with really useful nutritional guidance too. I’m probably in the best shape of my life and excited to get to the gym now during the week. Would highly recommend TS Fitness to anyone trying to start their fitness journey.
